reviewText:
This is a must have for any serious Salsa dancer.

This dvd is produced & directed by Australia's only Salsa dance master level teacher.

The styling techniques you can learn from this dvd are great. This dvd has many of the world's top Salsa dancers performing they own styling techniques.

I have all the dvd's from Salsaisgood web site & I must say they are all great & are recommended buys.
